attributes.action: Introduce suitability tests for all self-confessed supporters of Tottenham Hotspur Football Club applying to work with small children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is clearly a conflict of interest between seeking to educate our youth and allowing them to come into contact with anyone foolish enough to pay money to watch Spurs play. We, the people, demand that the government introduce legislation preventing these men and women of dubious character from working with our offspring unless they can at least tie their shoelaces and give an adequate excuse for supporting such a rubbish club.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
